import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../img/logo.png' import Blog from '../pages/BlogPage' import News from '../pages/News' import About from '../pages/About' import Contacts from '../pages/Contacts' import lang from '../lang' import '../CSS/Header.css' function Header() { const selectRef = useRef(null) // Use a ref to access the select element useEffect(() => { const select = selectRef.current // Get the select element from the ref const allLang = ['en', 'ru'] select.addEventListener('change', changeURLLanguage) function changeURLLanguage() { let lang = select.value window.location.href = window.location.pathname + '#' + lang window.location.reload() changeLanguage() } function changeLanguage() { let hash = window.location.hash hash = hash.substring(1) console.log(hash) if (!allLang.includes(hash)) { window.location.href = window.location.pathname + '#ru' window.location.reload() } select.value = hash for (let key in lang) { const element = document.querySelector('.lng-' + key) if (element) { element.innerHTML = lang[key][hash] } } } changeLanguage() }, []) return ( <>
Главная Блог Обо мне Контакты
} /> } /> } /> } /> ) } export default Header
